name: Digital Goods: Audiovisual Media Including Books, Movies, and Music
description:
Merchants that sell audiovisual works to a cardholder in a digitized
format. Such works are delivered by means of electronic transfer
(such as uploading, downloading, or streaming) and include, but are
not limited to, audiobooks, music files, ringtones, movies, videos, live
or recorded events, digital periodicals or magazines, digital pictures,
digital presentations, and news and entertainment programs.
